title: Action Comics - Hand drawn for sure, but anything Close?
content:
The original Action Comics font was first used, as far as I know, on the cover of Superman #1 in 1938. Since it is such a classic font, I was hoping that perhaps it had been recreated at some point. Any ideas where to look?

thanks-  
Eric
